entry.title: travel to pretoria
entry.content:
Daniel and I traveled Pretoria this afternoon, since Jan told us the jacaranda there are very beautiful. We went out apartment around 2:30pm, and arriving Pretoria around half past three, cause there are over 60km between Johannesburg and Pretoria.

After we arrived, we went to a restaurant which is called Harrie's.

The pancake was very nice(I also ordered strawberry mike shake which was awesome yet).

But unfortunately, There was start raining during our lunch(The weather in SA is ridiculous).So we have to decided working around the nearest park which name is Venning Park.

Then the rain became very gusty , So we have to leave. and I took the picture of jacaranda from our car:
